header-install-apps-content: If you havenâ€™t installed the WOM Pocket app yet, follow these links to download them for free and start receiving and paying using WOM vouchers.
app-badges-google-play-title: Install WOM Pocket from Google Play
app-badges-app-store-title: Install WOM Pocket from App Store
redemption-description: Tap the button below to redeem the vouchers and store them in your WOM Pocket app.
payment-description: Tap the button below to perform the payment through your WOM Pocket app.
migration-description: Tap the button below to complete the migration and restore your WOM vouchers in your WOM Pocket app.
countmein-description: Scan the QR Code again through the WOM Pocket app in order to redeem the WOM vouchers associated to the event or the location you are attending.
